StuffTheSpire:PlasmaPulse.NAME: Plasma Pulse
StuffTheSpire:PlasmaPulse.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block !StuffTheSpire:Diminishing! times. Draw 1 card. NL stuffthespire:Decreasing 1.

StuffTheSpire:FreeRealEstate.DESCRIPTION: stuffthespire:Unique. NL Gain !StuffTheSpire:Diminishing! Gold. Draw 1 card. NL stuffthespire:Decreasing 1.

StuffTheSpire:BloodClot.NAME: Blood Clot
StuffTheSpire:BloodClot.DESCRIPTION: Gain !StuffTheSpire:Diminishing! temporary max. Hp when you loose health from a card next time. NL stuffthespire:Decreasing 1.

StuffTheSpire:Recharge.NAME: Recharge

StuffTheSpire:Shiver.NAME: Shiver
StuffTheSpire:Shiver.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Strength. NL Discard a card. NL Add !M! Shiv to your hand. NL Apply 1 Weak to yourself and all enemies.
StuffTheSpire:Shiver.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Strength. NL Discard a card. NL Add !M! Shivs to your hand. NL Apply 1 Weak to yourself and all enemies.

StuffTheSpire:LaunchingStrike.NAME: Launching Strike
StuffTheSpire:LaunchingStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply stuffthespire:Flight. NL When the target looses stuffthespire:Flight, deal !D! damage again.

StuffTheSpire:Synthwave.NAME: Synthwave
StuffTheSpire:Synthwave.DESCRIPTION: Lightning triggers it's passive an additional time.

StuffTheSpire:ForEach.NAME: foreach(){}

!StuffTheSpire:Diminishing! times. NL Add a Burn into your hand. NL stuffthespire:Decreasing 1.

StuffTheSpire:LoadUp.DESCRIPTION: Loose 1 Fokus. NL Channel !M! Lightning. Next turn add a copy of stuffthespire:Discharge to your hand.

StuffTheSpire:Discharge.NAME: Discharge
StuffTheSpire:Discharge.DESCRIPTION: Evoke all of your orbs twice. NL Gain !M! Fokus. NL Exhaust.

StuffTheSpire:Slingshot.NAME: Slingshot
StuffTheSpire:Slingshot.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card. Deal !D! damage. Apply !M! Vulnerable.

StuffTheSpire:RockToss.NAME: Rock Toss
StuffTheSpire:RockToss.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Draw 1 card. NL If this card is exhausted add a copy of this card to your hand next turn. It costs 0 for the rest of combat.

StuffTheSpire:Injection.NAME: Injection
StuffTheSpire:Injection.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the target isn't poisoned, apply !M! Poison. NL Exhaust.

StuffTheSpire:FlameBurst.NAME: Flame Burst
StuffTheSpire:FlameBurst.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !M! damage to all enemies when this card exhausts.

!StuffTheSpire:Diminishing! stuffthespire:Flame_bursts into you hand. NL stuffthespire:Decreasing 1.

StuffTheSpire:BumpUp.NAME: Bump Up
StuffTheSpire:BumpUp.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Increase the damage of all of your 2 cost cards by !M!%.

StuffTheSpire:RagingBull.NAME: Raging Bull
StuffTheSpire:RagingBull.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Gain 2 Dexterity. After you play !M! more cards loose 2 Dexterity.

StuffTheSpire:SnapShoot.NAME: Snap Shoot
StuffTheSpire:SnapShoot.DESCRIPTION: If you have at least 3 orbs channeled, permanently add a stuffthespire:Snapshot that channels your 3 front most orbs to your deck. NL Fleeting.
StuffTheSpire:SnapShoot.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: If you have at least 3 orbs channeled, permanently add an upgraded stuffthespire:Snapshot that channels your 3 front most orbs to your deck. NL Fleeting.
